This endpoint is used to upload all collection pension payment on the system.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"collectionPensionPayments":{"description":"An array of objects, each representing a pension payment with the following keys","type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"amount":{"description":"The amount of money being processed","type":"string","example":"20000"},"bVN":{"description":"The bank verification number of the customer","type":"string","example":"5594095863"},"branchName":{"description":"The name of the branch processing the transaction","type":"string","example":"Oba Akran"},"channelName":{"description":"The name of the channel through which the transaction is processed","type":"string","example":"test chanel"},"customerName":{"description":"The name of the customer","type":"string","example":"Mike Kaks"},"customerPhoneNumber":{"description":"The phone number of the customer","type":"string","example":9047384903},"dateofbirth":{"description":"The date of birth of the customer in YYYY-MM-DD format","type":"string","format":"date","example":"1990-02-02"},"feeAmount":{"description":"The fee associated with the transaction","type":"string","example":"200"},"nIN":{"description":"The national identification number of the customer","type":"string","example":"493059485759"},"pfaaccount":{"description":"The account number with the pension fund administrator","type":"string","example":"20382932825"},"pfaname":{"description":"The name of the Pension Fund Administrator (PFA)","type":"string","example":"AHMAD JACOB"},"pmtperiod":{"description":"The payment period","type":"string","example":"4"},"rsaPin":{"description":"RSAPIN associated with the customer's account","type":"string","example":"PEN100920706811"},"transDate":{"description":"The date of the transaction","type":"string","example":"string"},"transactionID":{"description":"The transaction's ID","type":"string","example":"345r3e34rf34"},"transnarration":{"description":"A narration for the transaction","type":"string","example":"test transaction"}}},"example":[{"amount":"20000","bVN":"5594095863","branchName":"Oba Akran","channelName":"test chanel","customerName":"Mike Kaks","customerPhoneNumber":9047384903,"dateofbirth":"1990-02-02","feeAmount":"200","nIN":"493059485759","pfaaccount":"20382932825","pfaname":"AHMAD JACOB","pmtperiod":"4","rsaPin":"PEN100920706811","transDate":"string","transactionID":"345r3e34rf34","transnarration":"test transaction"}]},"scheduleCode":{"description":"A unique code representing the schedule for the pension payments","type":"string","example":"sch-0066"}}},"examples":{"Upload All Collection Pension Payment":{"value":{"collectionPensionPayments":[{"amount":"20000","bVN":"5594095863","branchName":"Oba Akran","channelName":"test chanel","customerName":"Mike Kaks","customerPhoneNumber":"09047384903","dateofbirth":"1990-02-02","feeAmount":"200","nIN":"493059485759","pfaaccount":"20382932825","pfaname":"AHMAD JACOB","pmtperiod":"4","rsaPin":"PEN100920706811","transDate":"string","transactionID":"345r3e34rf34","transnarration":"test transaction"}],"scheduleCode":"sch-0066"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
